titleStmt.title: An order made by the House of Commons assembled in Parliament for the establishing of preaching lecturers thoughout the kingdome of England and dominion of Wales : whereunto is added thirty five considerations upon the Booke of common prayer ... : with sexe reasons why the Booke of common prayer being corrected should continue : also an order by the Lords and Commons in Parliament touching the government and liturgie of the church.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
